title: Hit the Ground Running
description: Jesse Granger was born wild. He grew up fighting to protect the lives of innocent animals. But now he’ll have to fight for his own life. Someone’s been working tirelessly to destroy Jesse’s wildlife refuge, Granger Park, and ruin his good name. Will Jesse be able to overcome this menace and take back his life? Find out in...HIT THE GROUND RUNNING
author: Jeston Texeira
